oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Cattle Handling Skills-Contributor To Animal Welfare: The Veterinarian's Role
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Noffsinger, Tom
Locatelli, Lynn
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: animal welfare
stress
handling methods
caretaker priorities
performance
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Veterinarians can positively impact the level of animal welfare in cattle operations by learning and teaching low-stress handling methods. Shifting caretaker priorities from disease detection to performance enhancement results in improved levels of cattle welfare.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2004; 1
